Her major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. She aspires to own a fully stocked medical clinic and also to get enough profits so as to build her own house. Her monthly expenses includes rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of syrups, syringes, and cotton wool

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назира 54 года, замужем. Разведением скота начала заниматься более 34 года назад, начав бизнес с 5,000 сом KGS, на сегодняшний день благодаря ее упорству и целеустремленности получает ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 6,000 сом KGS. Супруг предоставляет услуги грузоперевозок населению, также помогает по хозяйству. В своем хозяйстве имеет: 4 дойные коровы, 1 кобылу, 28 овец. Назира хочет и дальше приумножить поголовье скота и заниматься разведением скота, в связи с этим обратилась в  Микрофинансовый Банк «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом, в сумме 60 000 сом(KGS) на покупку овец. На доходы от кредита Назира планирует увеличить поголовье скота.
texts.en: Nazira is 54 years old and married.  She got involved in breeding livestock over 34 years ago, having started this business with 5,000 som (KGS).  Today, thanks to her persistence and drive, she earns a monthly profit in the amount of 6,000 som (KGS).  Her husband provides delivery services to people and also helps with the business.  She has 4 dairy cows, 1 horse and 28 sheep on her farm.  Nazira wants to continue increasing her livestock headcount and be involved in breeding livestock.  To accomplish this, she requested a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) from the Microfinance Bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy sheep.  She wants to use the earnings from the loan to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis, con 53 años de edad vive con su esposa y 3 hijos. Desde hace 6 años se dedica a la confección, posee contratos con terceros y además creó su línea propia de blusas, sudaderas, bermudas, entre otros; cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa y, la producción que sacan, es vendida en diferentes pueblos de la región antioqueña; de esta manera ha logrado obtener los ingresos suficientes para solventar las necesidades básicas de su familia, luego de haber pasado por situaciones económicas difíciles debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo. Luis es un señor pujante, emprendedor y dedicado a su familia, quien es el motor principal de su vida y por quien lucha incansablemente para salir adelante. 
Actualmente solicita el tercer ciclo de crédito, que desea invertir en la compra de activo fijo (máquina ojaladora), además de insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones). Esto le dará la oportunidad de agilizar su proceso de producción, ya que la máquina que desea comprar, además de hacer los ojales, también sirve para pegar botones; así podrá cumplir con la entrega de la producción de manera oportuna, tendrá la capacidad de sacar más producción de línea propia para la venta y podrá ofrecer variedad de telas y colores que satisfagan las necesidades y gustos de sus clientes. Todo esto se verá reflejado en el incremento de sus contratos, sus ventas y afectará positivamente sus ingresos familiares. Además avanzará hacia el cumplimiento de su principal sueño que es acreditar su negocio y generar nuevas oportunidades de empleo, mejorará significativamente la calidad de vida de su familia y podrá ofrecer una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luis, 53 years old, lives with his wife and 3 children. He began his sewing business 6 years ago, and posses contracts with third parties in addition to having created his own line of blouses, sweaters, shorts, and others. He has the support of his wife, and they sell their products in different villages in the region. This way they are able to obtain the income necessary to sustain their family's basic needs, after having passed through some economic difficulties due to lack of employment opportunities. Luis is a very entrepreneurial and hardworking man, dedicated to his family, who is always fighting tirelessly to get ahead.

Currently, he is in his third loan cycle, and he wishes to invest in a new sewing machine in addition to the purchase of fabric, thread, and buttons in bulk. This will give him the opportunity to streamline his production process, since the machine he would like to buy can sew and stick buttons. With this machine he will be able to work more efficiently, will be able to produce more of his own clothing line to sell, and will be able to offer a variety of fabrics and colors that satisfy the demands of his clients. All of this will be reflected in the increase in his contracts and sales, and will have a positive impact on his family's income. He will advance towars his main dream of registering his business and creating new employment opportunities for others, while significantly improving the quality of life for his family and offering a better education to his children.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine as well as fabric, thread, and buttons in bulk

loans.name: Vera

texts.ru: Вера – вдова, детей воспитывает сама. Она имеет свой бизнес - продает пряжу,нитки, биссер, вышивку. Благодаря предыдущему КИВА кредиту она смогла получить дополнительную прибыль и оплатить учебу детей. Товар у Веры популярный, у нее всегда много покупателей. Вера просит предоставить ей еще один кредит в сумме 5,000 гривен на закупку товара. Она надеется снова полностью реализовать приобретенный товар и улучшить условия проживания своей семьи за счет полученной прибыли.
texts.en: Vera is a widow and raising her children by herself.  She has her own business - she sells yarn, threads, beads and embroidery.  Thanks to the previous Kiva loan, she was able to earn an additional profit and pay for her children's education.  Vera's merchandise is popular, and she always has a lot of customers.  Vera is requesting another loan in the amount of 5,000 hryvnia to buy merchandise.  She hopes to completely resell the purchased merchandise once again and improve her family's living conditions with the earned profit.

loans.use: to buy yarn, threads, beads and embroidery for resale

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru: Матлуба давно мечтала заняться каким-нибудь видом бизнеса, но раньше у нее не было, ни средств, ни какой либо поддержки. Когда она вышла замуж и родились дети, сама нужда заставила ее подумать не только о себе, но и о будущем детей. Посоветовавшись с мужем, она начала продавать различные виды детской одежды. Торговой точки у нее не было, и оборотный капитал был совсем маленький. У нее хватило все- таки силы и терпения, чтобы увеличить свой оборотный капитал с помощью деятельности, поддержки мужа и родных. Вот уже 7-лет Матлуба  занимается торговлей  различных видов детской одежды и обуви, торговая точка находится местном рынке района. У нее много клиентов бизнес ее официально зарегистрированный. Она планирует в будущем увеличить оборотный капитал, а для этого ей необходимы дополнительные инвестиции. Она раньше кредитовалась, в Имон-Интернешнл, обращается повторно (12 цикл) с целью получение займа для пополнения оборотного капитала. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки детской одежды. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Matluba has long dreamed of engaging in some kind of business, but in the past has had neither the resources nor any kind of support. When she got married and had children, she had to think now only about herself but also about the future of the children. After consulting with her husband, she started to sell different kinds of children's clothing. She did not have a trade stall and her working capital was quite small. She had enough strength and patience to increase her working capital with the help of her activities, supporting her husband and relatives. 

For the past seven years, Matluba has been trading various kinds of children's clothing and shoes. Her trade outlet is located in the local area market. 
She has many customers and her businesses is officially registered. 

She plans in the future to expand her working capital, and for this she needs additional investment. She has previously borrowed from IMON International and has referred to them repeatedly (12th cycle) with the aim of obtaining a loan for working capital. She is requesting a loan of US $3,000 to buy children's clothing.

loans.use: to buy children's clothes to increase her working capital

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: Patricia, de 36 años, es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 17, 15 y 5 años de edad respectivamente, con quienes vive en la casa de su madre. El trabajo de Patricia consiste en la venta de zapatos, sandalias, zapatillas y prendas de vestir, trabaja vendiendo entre sus amigos, vecinos y familiares, empezó desde hace 1 año y le va muy bien. Trabaja cómodamente sin descuidar a su hija más pequeña. En esta temporada también está ofreciendo ropas de verano y sandalias playeras complementando así sus ventas. Se siente muy a gusto desarrollando su trabajo ya que es retribuido con los buenos ingresos económicos que tiene, pero ella necesita de alguna ayuda adicional ya que quiere implementar su mercadería con una mayor cantidad de prendas femeninas, le esta yendo bien ya que vende mucho pero la falta del capital necesario impide que su negocio continúe incrementándose, su meta principal es que su negocio sea mas grande y prospero. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, es por eso que agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su crédito para continuar realizando su trabajo con mejores resultados. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado comprará sandalias, zapatillas, zapatos y ropa para damas , caballeros y niños.
texts.en:
Patricia is 36 years old and is a single mother with 3 children aged 17,15 and 5 years who live with her in her mother's house. Patricia's work consists of selling shoes, sandals, trainers and clothing. She sells to friends, neighbours and family members. She started a year ago and it is going well for her, and she finds it easy to work while looking after her youngest daughter. At this time of year she is offering summer clothing and beach sandals to supplement her sales. She feels very comfortable developing her work since she is benefitting from a good income. However, she needs a bit of extra help as she wants to introduce a larger selection of women's clothing to her range. It is going well because she is selling a lot but the lack of necessary capital is preventing her business from growing further. Her main goal is for her business to become bigger and more profitable.

On this occasion Patricia is asking for 1000 soles and for this reason she is grateful to all the people who make her loan possible so she can continue working to get better results. At the same time she promises once again to be punctual with the payment of her instalments. With the loan requested she will buy sandals, trainers, shoes and clothing for men, women and children.

loans.use: to buy sandals, trainers, shoes and clothing for men, women and children.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Diana, de 35 años, está casada y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Diana se dedica a la venta de pescado. Tiene su puesto de ventas instalado en uno de los mercados más concurridos de la ciudad. Se levanta muy temprano para comprar al por mayor sus productos a los pescadores que llegan a la orilla con todo lo recolectado en su jornada de pesca. Selecciona aquellas especies que tienen mayor demanda entre sus clientes, además se abastece de aquellos que tienen un buen precio en el mercado. Compra al por mayor y los vende por kilos, lleva realizando este trabajo por 5 años aproximadamente y menciona que con esta actividad provee de alimentación y educación a sus hijos. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo para descansar en su casa y velar por sus hijos, además siempre fue independiente y se acostumbró a valerse por si misma, espera mantener el mismo ritmo laboral y continuar trabajando por mucho mas tiempo. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/.1200, está muy agradecida por la oportunidad crediticia que le brindan y por el respaldo financiero que necesita para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará pescados de gran demanda ya que en esta temporada se incrementa el consumo de varias especies.
texts.en:
Diana is 35 years old, married, and has 3 children with whom she lives in her own house. Diana sells fish. She has a  sales post installed in one of the most visited markets of the city. She rises very early to buy her products at wholesale from fisherman who come ashore with all of their catch for the day. She selects the types that have the best demand among her customers. Diana has done this work for approximately 5 years, and she mentions that with this activity, she provides food and education for her children.

What Diana likes about her work is that she has time to rest at home and keep an eye on her children. Diana was always independent and she is accustomed to taking care of herself. She hopes to maintain the same work rhythm and continue working for a good while longer.  

On this occasion, Diana is requesting 1,200 sols. She is very grateful for the offered credit opportunity and for the financial support that she needs to continue ahead. In addition, she promises to make her payments in a punctual manner.

With the solicited amount, Diana will purchase fish in great demand, since the season has increased consumption of various species.

loans.use: to buy fish at wholesale.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca, de 62 años es una mujer amable. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijas en su casa propia, además cuenta con varios terrenos agrícolas. Ahora su vida se centra en la crianza de sus animales, cuenta con 87 cuyes, 4 ovejas y una vaca, los cuales cuida con mucha dedicación para luego venderlos. Su secreto es sembrar alfalfa, el cual utiliza como alimento. Además acondicionó una habitación de su casa para la venta de comida los fines de semana, ya la conocen sobre todo por los ricos platos que cocina. Además siembra maíz del cuzco en sus terrenos agrícolas, para esta temporada solo utilizó una parcela, pues las demás los alquilo a buen precio. Hoy en día espera obtener una buena cosecha, ya que trabajó mucho en su cuidado. Ahora desea incrementar su ganado, ya que hace poco vendió un promedio de 300 cuyes y para la próxima temporada tiene que abastecer su ganado para la venta. Este es su tercer crédito con kiva, por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que el apoyo financiero la ayuda a mejorar sus ingresos. Francisca, invertirá S/.3000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos de alfalfa, el cual le sirve de alimento para sus animales.
texts.en:
Francisca is 62 years old and a kind woman.  She lives together with her two daughters in the house she owns.  She also owns various pieces of farm land.  Currently, her life centers around raising animals.  She has 87 guinea pigs, 4 sheep, and a cow, all of which she cares for with a lot of dedication so that they can later be sold.  Her secret is to plant alfalfa, which she uses as feed.  She has also set up a room in her house to sell food on the weekends since she is well-known for the rich dishes that she cooks.  She also plants Cuzco corn on her farm land, but this season she only used one parcel and rented the rest for a good price.  She hopes to have a good harvest since she has worked hard caring for her crops.  She wants to increase her livestock, since she used to sell an average of 300 guinea pigs and in the next season, she wants to stock her livestock for sale.  

This is her third Kiva loan and she promises to be on time with her repayments since the financial support helps her improve her income.  Francisca will invest this 3000 soles in the purchase of organic fertilizer to nourish her alfalfa plants, which serve as feed for her animals.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer for her alfalfa crop.

loans.name: Limoncito Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento LIMONCITO,  Está  compuesto por ocho integrantes todas  mujeres,   la presidenta  del banco es la Sra. Dalcy  tiene 50 años casada y un hijo, ella se dedica a la venta y fabricación de artesanías el realiza joyas y bisutería para mujeres de manera manual, la Sra. Dalcy tiene su  puesto de venta que se encuentra en la localidad de Limoncito,  este préstamo es su primera  secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Dalcy va a usar este préstamo para la compra materiales para la fabricación de sus artesanías,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Dalcy va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando materiales y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una tienda de artesanía grande y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela,  la Sra. Dalcy es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
The Limoncito community bank is made up of eight female members.  

The president of the bank is Dalcy.  She is 50 years old, married, and has one child.  She works selling and making crafts.  She makes jewelry and costume jewelry for women by hand.  Dalcy has a sales post in the town of Limoncito.  

This loan is her first with the institution.  She will use this loan to purchase materials to make her crafts.  Her reason for requesting this loan is to continue improving her business.  Dalcy will use the benefits to continue purchasing materials and therefore improve her income.  

Her hope for her business is to have a large store where she can sell her crafts and provide better service to her customers.  Dalcy is a hardworking person who is happy with the opportunity provided.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make her crafts.

loans.name: Sandro Ernesto

texts.es:
Sandro, requiere de un nuevo préstamo porque necesita más capital de trabajo, ya que estos son una fuente favorable de ingresos; esta inversión le ayudara a comprar la materia prima necesaria, tales como: pintura, macilla, base, entre otros.
Cuenta el Sr. Sandro que el crédito anterior le ayudo porque logro adquirir los materiales para reparar el vehículo que hoy en día tiene a  la venta; se mantiene el mismo grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Sandro needs a new loan in order to support his working capital needs for his work repairing automobiles. This investment will help him to buy the necessary materials he needs such as paint and caulking among others. 

Sandro tells that his previous loan enabled him to aquire the materials to repair the vehicle that he currently has for sale. With his work he continues to support his family.

loans.use: to buy paint, caulking, and other products for auto repairs

loans.name: Nigina

texts.ru: Нигина добросовестная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 49 лет. Она осталась с одной дочкой после смерти мужа. Ей было очень тяжело пережить смерть мужа. Она всю свою жизнь проработала в сфере образования. Она имеет более 28 лет стажа. Последние 8 лет она работает в гимназии. Она преподаёт русский язык и русскую литературу. Нигина на полученную зарплату обеспечивает себя и дочь. Ее единственная дочь скоро выходит замуж и она должна организовать свадебное торжество своей дочери. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для проведения свадебного торжества своей дочери. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Nigina is a conscientious and hardworking woman. She is 49 years old. She was left with one daughter after the death of her husband. It was very hard for her to get past the death of her husband. 

She has worked her whole life in the education sphere. She has more than 28 years of experience. For the last eight years, she has worked in a school. 
She teaches Russian language and literature. With her earned salary, Nigina takes care of herself and her daughter. 

Her only daughter is getting married soon and she needs to organize the wedding celebration. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni for her daughter's wedding celebration.

loans.use: to put on a wedding party for her daughter

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús, de 33 años de edad, está casada con James quien es empleado y padre de sus 4 hijos de 12, 10, 7 y 2 años de edad respectivamente. Juntos habitan la casa de su hermana. Jesús se dedica ala venta de comidas por las mañanas en un puesto del mercado de la ciudad, donde atiende cordialmente a sus clientes quienes la visitan a diario por la buena sazón en sus preparaciones. Se inició hace más de 1 año, por iniciativa y capital propia, y hasta el momento lo viene realizando con el apoyo de su hermana con quien comparte las ganancias. Se decidió a empezar con su negocio por el deseo de contar con sus propios ingresos y no depender únicamente de su pareja, más bien apoyarlo con los gastos del hogar y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Éste será su cuarto préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles comprará los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus alimentos como arroz, azúcar, aceites y otros.
texts.en:
Jesús, 33 years old, is married to James who is employed and is the father of her four children ages 12, 10, 7 and 2. Together they live in her sister's house. Jesús works selling food in the mornings from a post her city's market, where she cordially attends to her clients who visit her daily as a result of the delicious meals she prepares. She began this business over a year ago, with her own initiative and capital, and until now has received the support of her sister with whom she shares her earnings. She decided to start this business in order to have her own source of income, and not depend exclusively on her husband. Additionally, she wants to be able to support him with the family's home expenses, and provide a better quality of life for her family. 

This will be her fourth loan with Kiva, and she feels very grateful for the financial support that she receives in order to get ahead. She promises to pay all of her loan repayments on time, and with the 800 Soles she is asking for will purchase the necessary ingredients to prepare her meals, including rice, sugar, and cooking oils.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, sugar, and cooking oils among others

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
Mateo, se le presenta de optar por un nuevo préstamo, ya que el anterior le brindo muchas oportunidades de crecer e incrementar sus ganancias; esta inversión le ayudara a  comprar una vaca horra, concentrado para el ganado y los cerdos; asimismo invertirá para ampliar la galera donde tiene los cerdos.
Con el crédito anterior mejoro su actividad, logro adquirir mejores cosechas  de maíz y frijol, también tiene dos cerdos grandes. Gracias al crédito las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Mateo is asking for a new loan, since his previous loan provided him with many opportunities to grow his business and increase his earnings. This investment will help him to buy a cow as well as feed for his livestock, in addition to allowing him to amplify the pig pen where he raises his pigs. 

With his previous loan, which he used for agricultural activities, Mateo improved his harvest of corn and beans, and was also able to raise two large pigs. Thanks to these loans, his family's circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy a cow and feed for his livestock, in addition to amplifying his pig pen

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru:
Илхому 36 лет. Он является жителем района Варзоб, куда входит Варзобское ущелье, известное своей курортной зоной. Илхом женат, имеет двоих дочерей и двоих сыновей. Его жена занимается шитьем, а дети учатся в школе. У Илхома высшее образование. Он в течение 7 лет работал учителем в средней школе. Сейчас он хочет начать собственный бизнес, который приносил бы ему ежедневный доход. Он решил заняться предоставлением услуги такси. У него есть водительские права и опыт вождения. Илхом накопил сбережение в размере 5000 сомони (TJS). Он еще нуждается в кредите в размере 3000 долларов США, чтобы купить машину и начать бизнес. Илхом планирует работать по маршрутной линии города Душанбе, который расположен в 25 километрах от его местожительства. Он будет работать в столице так как здесь услуга такси всегда востребована. 
Благодаря данному кредиту Илхом будет получать ежедневный доход от нового бизнеса и его финансовое состояние улучшится.
texts.en:
Ilhom is 36 years old. He is a resident of the Varzob region, where one enters the Varzob Gorge, known for its resorts. Ilhom is married and has two daughters and two sons. His wife is a seamstress and the children are in school. Ilhom has a higher education. He spent seven years working as a teacher in a high school. 

Now, he wants to start his own business which would bring him a daily income. He decided to get involved in offering taxi services. He has a driver's license and driving experience. Ilhom has accumulated savings of 5,000 somoni (TJS). He still needs a loan of US $3,000 to buy a car and start the business. 

Ilhom plans to work along the route lines of the city of Dushanbe, which is located 25km from his residence. He will work in the capital since taxi services are always in demand there.

Thanks to the loan, Ilhom will receive a daily income from the new business and his financial situation will improve.

loans.use: to buy a car in order to start a business offering taxi services

loans.name: Shoista

texts.ru: Шоиста 30-летняя замужняя женщина, имеющая троих хорошеньких дочерей. Она проживает со своей семьей на севере Таджикистана в городе Истаравшан. Шоиста занимается торговлей. Она на рынке города имеет торговую точку, где продает сезонные фрукты и овощи. Шоиста занимается этим делом одна в течение 8 лет. В частности сейчас она продает виноград, яблоко, персики, арбузы и дыню. Шоиста доброжелательный человек. Она всегда хорошо обслуживает своих покупателей. Шоиста хочет расширить свою деятельность. Она просит кредит для покупки машины для перевозки своих товаров на рынок. Приобретение  машины облегчило бы ее дело по перевозке и поставке товара. Она очень ждет поддержки.
texts.en: Shoista is a 30 year-old, married woman, who has three pretty daughters.  She lives with her family in the north of Tajikistan, in the city of Istaravshan.  Shoista is involved in sales.  She has a retail outlet at a city market, where she sells seasonal fruits and vegetables.  Shoista has been involved in this business for 8 years.  She primarily sells grapes, apples, peaches, watermelons and cantaloupe.  Shoista is a kind person.  She always treats her customers well.  Shoista wants to expand her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy a car to transport products to the market.  Buying a car would ease her business with transporting and delivering products.  She eagerly awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a car to transport products to the market and expand her business

loans.name: Irma Yolanda

texts.es: Irma Yolanda de 30 años de edad es originaria de san Martín jilotepequé, y desde hace ya mas de 6 años se dedica a la compra Y venta de leña de roble y de pino, y también es maestra de educación primaria. Irma agradece a Kiva y a Fape el apoyo brindado y también es una persona bien responsable, ella desea ayudar siempre a su mama y por ello lucha diariamente en su negocio, ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de leña para la venta.
texts.en: Irma Yolanda, 30 years old, is from San Martín Jilotepequé. For more than 6 years she has been working selling pine firewood, in addition to her work as a primary school teacher. Irma is very thankful for the help that Kiva and FAPE have offered her. She is a very responsible person who wishes to always help her mother, and it is for her that she fights daily to succeed with her business. Irma is asking for this loan in order to buy more firewood to sell.

loans.use: to buy firewood

loans.name: Zebo

texts.ru: Зебо добросовестная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 47 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж трудовой мигрант. Она более 5 лет занимается изготовлением и продажей пирожков. Она имеет точку продажи в центре своего района. Она изготавливает на заказ национальные пирожки «самбуса» для мероприятий, где накрывают на стол. Она в течение 1 дня готовит 150 штук самбуса и 100 пирожки. От полученного дохода она обеспечивает своих детей со всеми необходимыми средствами. Ее дети учатся в средней школе, и скоро начнется новый учебный год. Она должна купить школьные принадлежности как тетрадь, книги, сумка и т.п. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомон. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Zebo is a conscientious and hardworking woman. She is 47 years old. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a migrant worker. 

For more than five years, she has been involved in making and selling savory pastries. She has a trade stall in the center of her district. She prepares national "sambusa" pastries on order for events where they lay out a table of food. Over the course of one day, she prepares 150 pieces of sambusa and 100 pastries. 

From the earned revenue, she providers her children with all the necessary means. Her children are in high school, and soon will begin a new school year. She needs to buy school supplies, such as a notebook, books, a bag, etc. 

She is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, books, and bags for her children for new school year

loans.name: Sinoun's Group

texts.en: Sinoun, 54, is a widowed mother of one independent child and is a resident from Sa Ang district of Kandal province.  She grows rice as the main source of income and it returns her about 22,000 KHR per day. Sinuon is a fourth-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has managed her loans wisely to support her business and improve her living conditions. She is now joining a group of four to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay the plowing fee for her crops. Moreover, she will use some portion to buy a bicycle for her son for commute back and forth to his workplace. She hopes to gain a good yield from her business and make more income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay plowing fee

loans.name: Abdukarimjon

texts.ru:
Абдукаримжон молодой фермер и скотовод, проживающий в районе Дж.Руми на юге страны. Ему 24 года. Он еще холост и живет с родителями. Его отец строитель, а мать находится на заработках в России. 
Абдукаримжон имеет только среднее образование. После окончания школы у него не было возможностей поступить в ВУЗ. Он в возрасте 20 лет начал заниматься собственным бизнесом животноводством, а также сельским хозяйством. Он на собственном участке земли занимается выращиванием кукурузы, а также одновременно разводит крупнорогатый скот для продажи. В данный момент он нуждается в кредите. Абдукаримжон просит кредит для приобретения минеральных удобрений для урожая кукурузы, а также для закупа крупнорогатого скота с целью увеличения поголовья продаваемого скота. 
Абдукаримжон целеустремленный человек. Он планирует в будущем открыть ферму по животноводству.
texts.en:
Abdukarimjon is a young farmer and herdsman, living in the J.Rumy region in the south of the country. He is 24 years old. He is still single and lives with his parents. His father is a construction worker and his mother is working abroad in Russia. 

Abdukarimjon has only a high school education. After graduating from high school, he had no opportunity to go to college. At the age of 20, he started his own business raising livestock and also in agriculture. On his own plot of land, he grows corn, and at the same time he raises cattle for sale. At the moment, he needs a loan.

Abdukarimjon is asking for a loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizer for the corn crop, as well as for the purchase of cattle for the purpose of increasing the count of his sellable livestock.

Abdukarimjon is a goal-oriented person. He plans in the future to open a farm for livestock.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizer for the crop, and to buy livestock with the aim of increasing the animal count

loans.name: Lydia's Group

texts.en:
Lydia is a member of this group located in the city of Accra, where businesses trade various items. The group consists of two members who sell plastic plates, cooked groundnut and cosmetics in their community as well as nearby.

Lydia has sold plastic plates and cosmetics for five years. She is 38-years-old, single and has three children. This will be her third loan with ID-Ghana. She successfully repaid her previous loans.

Lydia's group is applying for a total loan amount of GHS 1500 from ID-Ghana to expand their businesses. Lydia will use her portion of this loan amount of GHS 1100 to buy different products such as cosmetic and plates. Her dream is to increase her sales and grow her business.

loans.use: To buy and sell plastic plates and cosmetic products.

loans.name: Heap's Group

texts.en:
Heap, 32, is a citizen from a rural village of Battambang province’s Ek Phnom district, Heap is married and has two children who are still in school.To feed her family, she has worked hard as a fisherman. Having been in this business for 10 years, she is able to earn about 73,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
Heap's group consists of three members and she is on her fourth loan with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy materials for catching fish and use a portion of it to repair her boat. She hopes to catch more fish so as to improve her living standard.

loans.use: To buy materials for catching fish

loans.name: Sambun's Group

texts.en: Sambun is 35 years old and married. She does not have any children yet. To support the entire family, she does rice farming, which she has been with for 20 years. Sambun is a first-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now, in a group of four, she is the leader. She and her co-borrowers are seeking  the same loan amount of 200,000 KHR each. She will spend her loan portion to buy herbicide for her farmland. She hopes to gain a good yield from her business so as she can set aside some money for future needs.

loans.use: To buy herbicide for her farmland

loans.name: Inom

texts.ru: Ином занимается выпечкой и продажей булочных изделий. Ему 32 года. Он женатый человек, имеет двоих сыновей и двоих дочерей, проживает со своей семьей в городе Кургантюбе в Хатлонской области. Дети учатся в школе, а жена помогает мужу в деятельности. Ином на втором этаже столовой имеет свой цех по производству булочек. В цехе работает он сам, его жена и еще четыре рабочих, которым он платит заработную плату. Ином занимается этим бизнесом уже 7 лет. Он получает хорошую прибыль с деятельности. Сейчас он запрашивает кредит в размере 2000 долларов США для покупки муки, сахара, маргарина, дрожжей, яиц, изюма и разрыхлителя для выпечки булочных изделий. У него постоянно много заказов и он усердно работает на развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Inom works as a baker and sells baked goods. He is 32 years old. He is a married man, has two sons and two daughters, and lives with his family in the town of Qurgan-Tube in the Khatlon region. The children are in school and his wife helps him in the activities. 

On the second floor of the dining hall, Inom has his own workshop for producing biscuits. In the shop, he himself works, as well as his wife and four other workers, to whom he pays a wage. Inom has been involved in this business for seven years. He receives a good profit from the business. 

Now, he is requesting a loan of US $2,000 to buy flour, sugar, margarine, yeast, eggs, raisins, and baking powder to prepare baked goods. 

He constantly has many orders and he is working hard to develop his business.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, margarine, yeast, eggs, raisins and baking powder for preparing baked goods

loans.name: Akhtam

texts.ru: Ахтам 28-летний молодой человек. У него жена и один маленький ребенок, с которыми он проживает в районе Джиликуль. Ахтам занимается сельским хозяйством. В данный момент он хочет помочь жене в открытии ее швейного бизнеса. Его жена умеет вышивать женские национальные платья, но не имеет швейной машинки. Ахтам просит кредит, чтобы купить жене новую модернизированную швейную машинку. Его жена планирует принимать заказы у себя дома и шить в день по два платья. Данный бизнес будет приносить им хорошую прибыль и их финансовое состояние намного улучшится.
texts.en:
Akhtam is a 28-year-old, young man. He has a wife and one small infant, with whom he resides in the Jilikul region. Akhtam is engaged in agriculture. 

At the moment, he wants to help his wife to open a sewing business. His wife knows how to embroider women's national dresses, but does not have a sewing machine. 

Akhtam is asking for a loan to buy his wife a new, modernized sewing machine. His wife plans to take orders at home and to sew two dresses per day. 

The business will bring them good profits and their financial situation will be much improved.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to help his wife start a business

loans.name: Lango

texts.en:
Please meet 41-year-old Lango from Liberia. To be precise, she lives in the community surrounding  Airport. She is married and has six children between 17 and 25 years old; only one lives at home and attends school. For the past 21 years, she been running a shop which sells beer, stout, soft drinks, dry gin etc. She started this business with money given to her by her husband and learned this way of selling from her friends.  She sells from Monday to Saturday, spending fifteen hours on her business. 

Lango is appreciative of her business because she makes more money. Her plan is to build a house. She is requesting a loan to purchase additional beer, stout, soft drinks, dry gin, etc. for her business. She would like to thank BRAC Liberia for their continued support.

loans.use: to purchase additional beer, stout, soft drinks, dry gin, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en:
Uzma is a 26-year-old, vigorous woman. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. But, due to low cash-in-hand, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. 

For this reason, Uzma requested a loan of PKR 35,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of thread in different colors and packs of laces, zippers, and buttons. In this way, she will be able to stitch up more dresses on-time. 

Uzma is in her fifth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors and packs of laces, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Gloria Esperanza

texts.es:
Doña Gloria tiene 47 años de edad ella es caficultora, ama de casa y madre de 3 hijos los cuales trabajan y la apoyan a ella y a su esposo en las diferentes actividades del campo como: limpieza, abono, corte, recolección al final de la cosecha, etc. Ella tiene 6 años de educación cursados los cuales pudo realizar gracias al apoyo financiero por parte de sus padres que con mucho sacrificio hicieron. Tiene mucha experiencia en la agricultura ya que hace más de 20 años aprendió a trabajar la tierra gracias a la enseñanza de sus padres y agradece a ellos mismos por haber heredado la tierra que hoy en día junto a su familia trabajan para generar ingresos para cubrir las diferentes necesidades del hogar.

Hoy en día ella solicita un financiamiento para la siembra de chapola nueva (plantilla de café) en una cantidad de 13,000 ejemplares que generaran mayores ingresos para su familia mejorando la producción y ampliando su plantación.

Sus planes a futuro son los de poder obtener una buena cantidad de tierra plantada de café con la cual pueda poco a poco cumplir sus sueños de ser una de las mejores productores de café de la zona ya que de esa manera ella también fortalecerá el patrimonio para sus hijos y sus nietos.
texts.en:
Doña Gloria is 47 years old, works cultivating coffee, and is the head of her household and mother of 3 children. Along with her children and her husband, Gloria works in the field cleaning, fertilizing, cutting, and harvesting her crops. She was fortunate to be able to study for 6 years, thanks to the financial support she received from her parents, who sacrificed a lot in order to provide her with the opportunity. She has significant agricultural experience, since she began learning how to work the fields over 20 years ago from her parents. She is very grateful for their support as well as for having inheritted their land. She and her family work every day in order to generate enough income to cover their basic expenses. 

Today she is asking for a loan in order to plant a new coffee crop of 13,000 plants, with which she hopes to generate greater income for her family. 

Her future plans are to be able to have a large coffee plantation, little by little completing her dream of becoming one of the best coffee producers in the region. This way, she will be able to strengthen her economic position for her children and grandchildren.

loans.use: to prepare the earth in order to plant a new coffee crop

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, de 33 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor, además de tener muchas ganas de salir adelante, es soltero, vive en compañía de su madre, hermano, cuñado, sobrino. Instalados cómodamente en la casa de su madre. La actividad que realiza Jorge es la venta de comida rápida para lo cual cuenta con un carrito freidor de papas en donde realiza los preparativos de sus comidas, su puesto de venta está instalado en el frontis de la casa de su madre desde alli atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico y una ocupación ya que le falta terminar sus estudios de técnico  en computación, y con las ganancias está pagando sus estudios, además de poder apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, viendo las ganancias que le deja está ahorrando para en un futuro constituir su propia empresa de computadoras y sentirse un profesional realizado. Este es su cuarto préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles, comprará utensilios para implementar su negocio como platos, tenedores, mesas, sillas y otros. Así también ingredientes como papas, pollos y verduras que piensa comprar a precio por mayor.
texts.en:
Jorge, 33 years old, is a hardworking and entrepreneurial man who has a great desire to get ahead. He is single, lives with his mother, brother, brother-in-law, and nephew. They are very comfortable in his mother's house. Jorge works selling fast food. He has a cart with a potato fryer where he preapares his food, and places his cart in front of his mothers house from which he attends his clients. He likes this business as it permits him to have his own income as well as a job, since he has not yet finished his technical studies in computing. With his income, he is paying for his school expenses in addition to supporting his family with expenses for the home. With some of his earnings, he is saving for the future in order to someday have his own computer business and work as a professional. 

This is his fourth Kiva loan and Jorge is very grateful for the financial support he has received. He is dedicated to repaying all loan installments on time. With the 2,500 Soles he is asking for, he will buy utensils such as plates, foks, tables, chairs, and others. Additionally, he will buy potatoes, chicken, and vegetables in bulk.

loans.use: to buy utensils and incredients such as potatoes, chicken, and vegetables

loans.name: Generación Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “GENERACIÓN”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Martha es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de mantas, carnicería, venta de ropa, tejido de mantillas de bebe, mantas de alpaca, comerciante de bicicletas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Martha es integrante, ella indica que hace ocho años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración y venta de mantas; este negocio lo emprendió cuando aprendió la técnica de tejido de su amiga.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el trabajo en grupo y el asesoramiento.
texts.en:
The lending group “GENERACIÓN” will begin its first lending cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of its Focal Center of the Andes. This group is composed of 8 members and is directed by an executive group of which Martha is the President. The businesses of each of the members are different, and include: sewing blankets, butcher shops, selling clothes, sewing baby items, making alpaca blankets, and selling bicycles. 

This loan will benefit Martha, who indicates that she joined Pro Mujer 8 years ago after receiving an invitation from a Loan Officer of the institution who went to visit her in her home. Currently, Martha works making and selling blankets, a business which she started after learning how to knit from a friend. 

The loan that she is asking for now is to buy more wool, which she will buy from the bulk sellers in the city of El Alto. She will then make her blankets and sell them to her clients. This work enables her to generate the necessary resources to maintain her family, since she is married and has 4 children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Martha responds that she likes working as part of a lending group and benefits from the advice that she receives.

loans.use: to buy wool

loans.name: Jumaboy

texts.ru: Чумабой скотовод. Ему 59 лет. Он проживает со своей семьей в городе Конибодом на севере страны. У него двое сыновей и одна дочь. В настоящее время его оба сыновей находятся на заработках за пределами страны. Чумабой обеспечивает семью за счет скотоводства. Он разводит крупнорогатый скот для дальнейшей продажи. Чумабой занимается данным бизнесом более 9 лет. Ему в деятельности усердно помогает жена. Сейчас в его хозяйстве имеются две коровы ярославской породы. Чтобы увеличить поголовье своего скота, Чумабой обратился за кредитом. Он собирается купить трех голов коров и корм. Получив прибыль с продажи скота, Чумабой хочет провести свадьбу сыновей. Он будет очень признателен за поддержку.
texts.en:
Jumaboy is a herdsman. He is 59 years old. He lives with his family in the town of Konibodom in the north of the country. He has two sons and one daughter. Currently, his two sons are making money abroad. 

Jumaboy provides for the family through livestock. He raises cattle for resale. Jumaboy has been involved in this business for more than nine years. In this hard work, he is helped by his wife. Now, his farm has two Yaroslav breed cows. 

To increase the number of their cattle, Jumaboy applied for a loan. He is going to buy three cows and their feed. 

With the earned profit from the sale of the cattle, Jumaboy wants to hold a wedding for his sons. He will be very grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy three heads of cattle and their feed, with the profits to marry off his sons

loans.name: Ho's Group

texts.en:
Ho is 38 years old and she has one child. She is a villager from a rural area of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province. She plants rice as a main source of her income, and works for others for a fee to earn extra income for the family. She has been in this business for 20 years, and she can earn about 35,000 KHR per day to support her family's daily expenses. 

Ho has never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before. Now she is a group leader of two members, and they are requesting a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. 

As the leader, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to double her current business income to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Ani

texts.en:
This young nice lady’s name is Ani and she is 23 years old. She lives with her mother and brother in Vanadzor city. She has graduated Vanadzor Pedagogical Institute the department of Biology, but unfortunately she didn’t manage to find a job in her specialty and now she works at a beauty salon as an accountant. She is not married and since she has a lot of free time she has seriously decided to study accounting programs.

So Ani is asking for a loan of 300,000 Armenian drams to buy a computer and to get acquainted with all details of this sphere.

loans.use: to buy a computer and to study accounting programs

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia  is divorced   with six children and all her children go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. She has a mini-bakery. She has applied for a loan of 800,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more cooking oil, wheat flour, sugar and butter.  She has been in this business for 18 years and sells on a  retail basis, six days out of every week.  She doesn’t have any other income generating activity. 

Sylvia's major business challenges include thieves, the rainy season and defaulters.  She is aspiring of owning a big bakery and also to buy a plot of land so as to build rental rooms.  She resides in her own house and the family has access to electricity but not to piped water.  Her monthly expenses include school fees and  feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, wheat flour, sugar and butter.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a second-time borrower of UGAFODE Microfinance, applying for UGX. 2,000,000. He is a 39-year-old married gentleman, a father of five children whom he looks after with the help of his wife. He is engaged in charcoal supplying as his major source of income.  Besides the charcoal supplying business, he also earns from his residential house that he portioned for commercial purposes. He is faced with a challenge of his tenants complaining that the rooms are not in a good state and that security is not good.

He applied for the loan to have the portioned house fully completed and also have the house surrounded by a fence to tighten security for his tenants, He will get more money after he has made the place secure. He is hard-working.

In the photo is Robert and an Ugafode staff member (in a tie).

loans.use: To buy building materials to finish and fence the house.

loans.name: Santa Rosa Group

texts.es:
La señora Olga Marilu es casada, tiene 35 años de edad, de escolaridad primaria completa, tiene 5 hijos y 4 de ellos estan estudiando, se dedica a la compra y venta de animales de corral, inició este negocio con dos marranos y a la fecha lleva 6 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un prestamo que lo utilizará para la compra de animales de corral tales como: cerdos, chompipes y pollos, desea en el futuro contar con una granja grande. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales de corral.
texts.en:
Olga Marilu is married, 35 years old, completed primary school, and has 5 children, 4 of whom are studying. She works buying and selling corral animals, and started this business with 2 pigs. She currently has 6 years of experience and benefits from the support of her husband who works in agriculture. 

Olga is organizing a lending group and asking for a loan to use for the purchase of corral animals including pigs, turkeys, and chickens. She hopes to some day have a large farm. The other members of her lending group also work raising corral animals.

loans.use: to buy corral animals

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр занимается выращиванием ранних овощей - огурцев и помидоров. У него есть большой участок земли, где построено несколько теплиц. 15 лет назад, когда Александр только женился, у него был только пустой земельный участок. Каждый год после урожая Александр старался установить новую теплицу. За это время Александр имел успех в своем бизнесе и сейчас уже имеет 8 отапливаемых теплиц.

Александр планирует вложить 20,000 грн. в приобретение пленки, удобрений и ремонт теплиц. Ему нужно подготовить до холодов теплицы, утеплить их так как растет второй урожай. Ему нужно накрыть теплицы второй пленкой и отремонтировать окна так как они повреждены ветром и еще закупить удобрения для лучшего роста растений. Тогда с приходом холодов урожай будет защищен и Александр сможет продавать урожай по хорошей цене.
texts.en:
Aleksandr is engaged in growing early vegetables - cucumbers and tomatoes. He has a large plot of land where several greenhouses were constructed. 15 years ago, when Aleksandr was just married, he had only an empty plot of land. Every year after the harvest, Aleksandr tried to install a new greenhouse. During this time, Aleksandr had success in his business and now he has eight heated greenhouses.

Aleksandr plans to invest 20,000 hryvnia in the acquisition of plastic film and fertilizers and in greenhouse repairs. He needs to prepare a cold greenhouse, to warm them while a second crop grows. He needs to cover the greenhouse with a second film, to repair the windows as they are wind-damaged, and to purchase fertilizer for better plant growth. Then with the arrival of the cold, the crop will be protected and Aleksandr will be able to sell the crop at a good price.

loans.use: to purchase film and fertilizer and to fix his greenhouses

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.en:
Dilfuza is smart woman. She is 35 years old, and a widow with two sons, Shohruh and Shohjahon. Dilfuza is  the only income earner in her family; she is a dressmaker. She sews very wonderful national women dresses, and that’s why she has good customers. She also works at the hospital as a nurse.

She works hard to earn money to provide her children with all necessary things. She wants to repair her house, as it is in bad condition. She is planning to repair the outside of the house. She is asking for a loan of 3,500 Somoni to buy building materials such as cement, wood, etc. 

She awaits your support. She is an honest woman and does the best for the future her children.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement, wood, etc. to repair her house

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is a 55-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store in her community with her husband for the last seven years. She offers various goods for daily use. She has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. She is the mother of three children and is motivated to provide for her family.

As she wants to grow her business, she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to buy stock of grains, rice and sugar along with packs of beverages. She then would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She is in her 4th loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to deal with personal expenses and to increase business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of grains, rice and sugar along with packs of beverages

loans.name: El Zapote Group

texts.es:
La señora Dora Patricia de estado civil casada, cuenta con 25 años de edad, curso 4 años de educacion secundaria, tiene 2 hijos y los 2 estan estudiando, se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, inició este negocio con la ayuda de su familia y hasta la fecha lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien es electrisista.

Decide organizar un grupo y solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará pra la compra de pollos para engordarlos y para la compra de concentrado para las mismas, desea en el futuro tener una granja y además vender carne de pollo. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la venta de comida y al comercio.
texts.en:
Dora Patricia is married, 25 years old, has completed 4 years of secondary education, and has 2 children who are currently in school. She works raising chickens which she fattens prior to sale, and she began this business with the help of her family. She has been working raising chickens for over 3 years, and has the support of her husband who is an electrician. 

Dora Patricia decided to organize a lending group and ask for a loan which she will use to buy more chickens. She will also purchase feed in order to fatten them. In the future, she would like to have a farm and sell beef in addition to chicken. The other members of her lending group work selling food and in commerce.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia, de 40 años, está casada con James con quien tiene 6 hijos, todos viven juntos en su casa propia. Celia se dedica a la confección. Tiene en su casa un pequeño taller de corte y confección en donde realiza todos los trabajos que le encargan sus clientes ya sean colocaciones de cierres, botones, remiendos u otros, ahí también plasma cada uno de los diseños. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 11 años y con el paso del tiempo ha ido aprendiendo mucho. Le gusta mucho lo que hace, pues le permite mantenerse distraída, además de que puede disponer de su tiempo y manejar sus horarios cómodamente, por fortuna tiene muchos clientes que van en busca de sus servicios por el buen trabajo que realiza, es una gran trabajadora de este rubro y desea seguir creciendo para el bienestar de su familia y el de su economía. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1800, por tanto esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su negocio, además, se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales como telas, agujas, hilos, elásticos y cierres además comprará un set de tijeras y reglas de costura para poder tener un mejor acabado en sus diseños.
texts.en:
Celia, 40 years old, is married to James and has 6 children, all of whom live in her home. Celia works as a seamstress. In her house she has a small shop where she completes all of the jobs given to her by her clients, which include mending, alterations, and repairing buttons, among others. She has worked as a seamstress for 11 years and has learned a lot during this time. She really enjoys her work, as it keeps her occupied and allows her to manage her own schedule. She is fortunate to have many clients who seek out her services for the good quality of her work. She is very hardworking and hopes to continue improving the wellbeing of her family and their economic situation. 

Celia is currently asking for 1,800 Soles. She is very grateful for the financial support she receives and feels confident about her prospects to advance with her business. She has promised to repay all loan installments on time. With this loan, Celia will buy materials such as fabric, needles, thread, and elastics, as well as a set of scissors and sewing patterns in order to improve her designs.

loans.use: to buy fabric, elastic, needles and thread, among other sewing materials

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 57-year-old married woman. She is a vigorous lady and, for the past six years, has been running a business selling cloth. She buys different fabrics in various colors and designs from the wholesale market and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. 

Hasan is requesting a 25,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of fabrics in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. Hasan expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of fabrics in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en:
Tahira is 32 years old, a married woman and mother of two children. The man shown in the photo is Tahira’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Tahira has applied for a loan of Rs. 25,000 for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. She is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Sakina's Group

texts.en:
Sakina has asked for a Kiva loan for her daughter from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan as a member of a two-person lending group.

Her daughter is a very hardworking and talented woman. She owns a tailoring academy where she delivers tailoring techniques to her students. She has only two tailoring machines for the academy and because of this, she has lower numbers of students and she is unable to generate a good amount of income. She is interested in purchasing one more tailoring machine so that she can increase the number of students and her net income. 

This business is the only source of income for the family. Sakina has faced so many challenges in her life and her daughter helps her a lot in generating income. She remains worried about her daughter's future and her marriage. 

Sakina hopes that the loan would be helpful for her daughter's work. She is thankful to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase one tailoring machine to teach tailoring techniques

loans.name: Ángela Sonia

texts.es: Ángela es madre de 2 hijos, a los cuales ha sacado adelante con los ingresos que ha obtenido durante su vida laboral. Ha trabajado como vendedora de mostrador en varias distribuidoras y almacenes de cadena, gracias a esto obtuvo conocimientos y experiencia en el manejo administrativo de este tipo de negocios. Hace pocos meses, decidió independizarse y montar su propio negocio, una distribuidora de insumos para comidas rápidas, con el interés de generar ingresos por cuenta propia e incrementar su patrimonio familiar. Ángela es una señora emprendedora, dedicada y cada día se proyecta hacia el cumplimiento de sus objetivos, pues es consciente que debe trabajar arduamente para cumplir sus sueños, especialmente el de ampliar su negocio y generar oportunidades de empleo entre las personas que conforman su núcleo familiar. Esto la motiva para solicitar el apoyo del crédito, que será invertido en la compra de activo fijo (congelador) y surtido al por mayor (panes, carnes frías, quesos, salsas, productos desechables), con lo cual podrá seguir acreditando su negocio, además de tener más variedad de productos y marcas disponibles para ofrecer con los que pueda satisfacer los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes; todo lo anterior se verá reflejado en el incremento de sus ventas y en el margen de ganancias, lo que le dará la oportunidad de tener una estabilidad económica favorable para mejorar las condiciones de vida y el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Angela is the mother of 2 children, whom she is getting ahead with the income she has obtained during her working life.  She has worked as a saleswoman and product demonstrator for chain stores.  Thanks to this she has gained experience in managing different types of businesses and she decided to go on her own and start her own business a few months ago.  She distributes supplies for fast food.  She wants to generate her own income and increase her contribution to her family.  Angela is an enterprising woman who focuses daily on achieving her dreams, especially expanding her business and generating job opportunities for her family.  She is asking for this loan to buy a freezer and inventory in quantify (bread, cold cuts, cheeses, salsas, disposable products) so she can stock her business and meet her customers’ needs, and also to have a greater variety and brands of products available so she can meet her customers’ desires.  This will increase her sales and profits, which will give her the chance to have better financial stability to improve her family living conditions and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: San Pablo  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito San Pablo está formado por 12 mujeres quienes luchan día a día para mejorar la estabilidad económica de sus hogares, se dedican a laborar en diferentes actividades como la agricultura, la crianza de animales y el comercio, con estos trabajos les pueden brindar a sus hijos un mejor futuro, su orgullo es aun mantener viva su cultura y tradiciones. Viven por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad goza de una belleza natural donde se puede admirar la naturaleza, al igual que la colonial que guarda celosamente la historia de la ciudad.


Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Lorena, tiene 33 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 10 y 8 años que estudian en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y presta sus servicios como taxista, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.


Doña Lorena desde hace 20 años se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida, ella tiene un pequeño local en el cual trabaja de lunes a sábados solo medio día y el resto de su tiempo lo dedica su familia e hijos. 


Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de una vajilla y víveres para continuar en su negocio.


Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The San Pablo credit group consists of 12 women who strive daily to improve their homes’ economic stability.  Hey work in various activities like agriculture, raising animals and in commerce.  They are able to provide better futures for their children by means of these jobs.  

They are proud to still maintain their culture and traditions alive.  They live around Cuenca, a city that enjoys natural beauty in which nature can be admired as well as the colonial that jealously safeguards the city’s history.

One of the group members is Lorena, 33.  She’s married and has had two children who are 10 and 8 years old and attend the little local school.   Her husband’s a driver and provides taxi service.  They don’t own a house; they are renters.

For the last 20 years, Lorena has been making and selling food.  She has a small stand she works in half-days from Monday to Saturday.  She spends the rest of her time tending to her family and children.

She is going to use the loan to buy dinnerware and foodstuffs to continue in business.  Her goal is to own a house.

loans.use: to buy dinnerware and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Donal

texts.es:
Donal tiene 56 años de edad, es padre soltero de 2 hijos con quienes vive en la casa de su madre.
Donal se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente de granos cacao y café, tiene una experiencia de 15 años en este rubro. Se inició con esta actividad gracias a su padre ya que el era agricultor.
El principal problema en esta actividad es la fuerte variación que sufre el precio del cacao y café, en época de campaña, pero gracias a su experiencia y a sus conocimientos ha sabido sacar adelante la producción, lo que ahora espera es aumentar la producción de sus  cultivo y cambiar la producción normal por una producción de mayor calidad.Este es su primer crédito Kiva, por está razón se siente muy agradecido con el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.Con el monto solicitado de S/.500 soles comprará abono orgánico para sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Donal, 56, is a single father of two children he lives with in his mother’s house.  Donal works in agriculture especially growing cocoa beans and coffee; he has 15 years’ experience in this line of work.  He started with this activity thanks to his father who also worked in agriculture.

The main problem in this activity is the extreme price fluctuations in cocoa beans and coffee during the growing season but thanks to his experience and skills he’s been able to get good crop yields.  What he hopes for now is to increase crop production and to change his normal production for a higher quality one.

This is his first Kiva loan so he feels very grateful for the financial support he’s getting to continue forward; he also commits to make his payments punctually.  He will use the requested 500 soles to buy organic manure for his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Ayeshah

texts.en:
Ayeshah is 21-year-old lady and enjoys doing hand embroidery. She started doing work with her husband who is also shown in the photo. Her embroidery patterns are very popular in her area. She is motivated to provide her family with the basic necessities of life including food, clothes and education. 

In order to meet the growing demand for embroidery she needs to buy more frames, needles and thread of different colors. For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 from Kashf Foundation. In this way she can complete the orders of her customers on time. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: to buy more frames, needles and thread of different colors.

loans.name: Imtiaz

texts.en:
Imtiaz is a 48-year-old married woman. She has had a business of hand-embroidery for the past ten years. She is zealous about her work and client demand is strong.  But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. Imtiaz’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best-earning resource in her household.

She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities to meet with the increasing demand. She shared her dream of opening her own shop in the market to display her work.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities

loans.name: Sidra

texts.en:
Sidra is a 24-year-old married woman who is running a business of milk-selling with her husband for a period of about four years. She has four buffaloes, which she uses for milk-selling to the people of her locality. She also sells butter and cheese to generate an extra amount of profit. 

Sidra has become famous for providing good-quality milk and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She wants to grow her business so she applied for a loan of PKR 30,000. This will allow her to purchase one more buffalo. Sidra is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.name: Tohouine Eugénie's Group

texts.fr:
Tohouine et les 2 autres membres de son groupe se connaissent depuis près de 10 maintenant car elles habitent toutes le même quartier.

Tohouine a 41 ans et a 2 enfants dont elle assume seule la charge suite au décès de son mari.

Elle a aujourd'hui besoin d'un crédit pour se procurer des fruits (ananas, pommes, oranges...) et des légumes (tomates, oignons...) afin de renforcer son activité pour répondre à sa clientèle qui est très exigeante.
texts.en:
Tohouine and the two other members of her group have known each other for 10 years, having all lived in the same neighborhood. Tohouine is 41 years old and has two children that she has been the sole caregiver for since the death of her husband.

Currently Tohouine needs a loan to be able to acquire fruits (pineapples, apples, oranges, etc.) and vegetables (tomatoes, onions, etc.) in order to grow her business and to meet the needs of her demanding customers.

loans.use: purchase fruits and vegetable for her shop display

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 60 años de edad, está casada con Lucio, ambos tienen 7 hijos a los que cuidarón con mucho amor; ahora ellos viven con su nieta en una casa alquilada. Ya no tiene hijos a quienes cuidar, todo ellos son grandes y maduros; se siente orgullosa. Pero tiene que trabajar junto a su esposo para poder mantenerse y no brindar preocupaciones a sus hijos además de cuidar a su nieta. Reyna se dedica a la siembra de maíz, papa y alfalfa en sus propios terrenos agrícolas, productos que cuida constantemente, ya en la cosecha comercializa sus alimentos al mercado mayorista de la ciudad, donde tiene clientes fijos. Asimismo su esposo se dedica a hacer taxi entre dos ciudades cercanas. Este es su tercer crédito con kiva, por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que el apoyo financiero la ayuda a mejorar sus ingresos. Reyna, invertirá los S/.3800 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Reyna, 60, is married to Lucio and they have 7 children they raised with much love.  Now they live with their granddaughter in a rented house.  She no longer has children to care for, they are all grown up and mature; she feels proud.  But she and her husband still have to work to support themselves in addition to caring for their granddaughter and not cause worry for their children.

Reyna works growing corn, potatoes and alfalfa on her own farmland.  She cares for these products constantly and after harvesting them sells them in her city’s wholesale market where she has regular customers.  Her husband also works providing taxi service between two nearby cities.

This is her 3rd loan with Kiva so she promises to be punctual with her payments because with the financial support helps her improve her income.  Reyna will use the 3,800 soles to buy organic manure to nourish her crops.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy nutritional animal feed.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur lives in Vanadzor city with his wife and three children (a son and two daughters). Artur has studied at the Polytechnic Institute in the department of Light Industry Technology.

Today Artur is engaged in a food trading business: in a rented car, he provides cheese to the city food markets. He provides tasty, fresh and various assorted cheeses. He buys it from the different dairy product workshops once a week. He mentions that this business is a very profitable one, and among our nation the cheese from dairy products are the most popular ones and he always has a lot of orders. But, nevertheless, the assortment of cheese that he provides is not very large, so he asks a loan of 300,000 Armenian drams in order to enlarge it and his business income as well.

loans.use: to enlarge cheese assortment

loans.name: Irina

texts.en: Irina is an entrepreneur from Kamenka-Dneprovskaya, Ukraine. She has been in agricultural business for many years growing vegetables for sale. Last year she started a new business -- selling packed food in a small kiosk. The business began to grow. Now Irina would like to open a second location to increase her sales. Her husband and teen-age son help Irina in this new family business. Irina is asking for a loan of 21,000 Grivnas to purchase a kiosk and start a second location.

loans.use: expand her business to another location

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en:
Here is 33 years old Mamie from Liberia.  She lives in the Air Port area of Margibi County.  She is unmarried and has four children between the ages of 2 and 15, only three are in school and live at home.

Over the past fifteen years now Mamie has been selling frozen food such as chickens, pig feet, spare ribs, and fish in the local market.  She spends 9 hours on her business each day, six days a week. She described herself as hard-working business woman.

Mamie is requesting a loan to purchase more chickens, pig feet, spare ribs, and fish for her business.  Her plans is to build her house and educate her children.

loans.use: buy meat and fish to sell

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es: Raquel, de 31 años es una mujer amable. Vive en compañía de su esposo Alan, con quien tiene un pequeño hijo al que cuidan en una casa alquilada desde hace 5 años. Ella gusta de tomar fotografía, desde joven se dio cuenta de que tenía talento para ello y ya cuando formó su familia, pensó en la manera de apoyar a su esposo en los gastos familiares es entonces que tuvo la idea de abrir un pequeño estudio fotográfico. “Al inicio fue muy difícil pues no tenía ninguna idea de comenzar. Ahora tengo muchos clientes”, comenta. Su estudio lo abrió en una pequeña casa al frente del registro de identidad de la zona, es por esa razón que los 2 años que tiene en este negocio; logró buenos ingresos y clientes estables, pues realiza tomas fotográficas para que los ciudadanos se registren ahí. Ahora desea mejorar su estudio pues aunque todavía no tiene competencia, quiere estar preparada para ello. Este es su tercer crédito con kiva, por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que el apoyo financiero la ayuda a mejorar sus ingresos. Raquel, invertirá los S/.1000 soles en la compra de insumos para su trabajo como: tintas paras imprimir, papeles fotográficos, todo al por mayor.
texts.en:
Raquel is 31 and likable. She lives with her husband, Alan, with whom she has a young son that they care for in the house they have rented for the past five years. She likes to take photographs, and she realized as a teenager that she had talent. When she started her family, she thought about how she could help her husband pay household expenses and decided to open a small photography studio. "At first it was very hard because I didn't have any idea of how to get started. Now I have a lot of clients," she says. 

She opened her studio in a small house across from the local registry office. The location has helped her earn a good income and attract regular clients over the past two years because she takes photos of the residents who register there. She wants to renovate her studio because, although she doesn't have competition yet, she wants to be ready for it.

This is her third loan cycle with Kiva. She promises to make her payments on time, as the funding helps her earn more. Raquel will use the loan of 1000 soles to buy wholesale printing supplies such as ink and photographic paper.

loans.use: to buy wholesale printing supplies such as ink and photographic paper.

loans.name: Nancy's Group

texts.en:
The group called Nancy's Group is composed of three women, who average 33 years of age and two children each. They know one another through ties of community, friendship, and commerce. To bolster their financial capacity for operating their businesses better, they joined the micro finance institution ID-Ghana and are now on their second loan.

This group of women does commerce in Malta Guinness through Nancy, who is standing at the extreme left in the photo.
